綿.definition: silk floss; continuous; soft; weak; mild-mannered (dialect)

綿亙.definition: to stretch in an unbroken chain (esp. of mountains)

綿延.definition: (esp. of a mountain range) to be continuous; to stretch long and unbroken

綿竹.definition: Mianzhu, county-level city in Deyang 德陽|德阳[De2 yang2], Sichuan

綿竹市.definition: Mianzhu, county-level city in Deyang 德陽|德阳[De2 yang2], Sichuan

綿竹縣.definition: Mianzhu county in Deyang 德陽|德阳[De2 yang2] prefecture, Sichuan

綿綿瓜瓞.definition: lit. (of a melon vine) laden with melons of all sizes (idiom); fig. (of descendants) to thrive and prosper for generations

綿聯.definition: variant of 綿連|绵连[mian2 lian2]

綿薄.definition: my humble effort; my meager contribution (humble)

綿裡藏針.definition: lit. a needle concealed in silk floss (idiom); fig. ruthless character behind a gentle appearance; a wolf in sheep's clothing; an iron fist in a velvet glove

綿邈.definition: far back in time; faraway; remote

綿長.definition: long and continuous (coastline, sound etc); extensive; prolonged

綿陽.definition: see 綿陽市|绵阳市[Mian2yang2 Shi4]

綿陽市.definition: Mianyang, prefecture-level city in Sichuan Province 四川省[Si4chuan1 Sheng3]
